page.title: 02EXPLORING TARRANT VALLEY
page.content: We got off the coach at the war monument on the busy A354 Salisbury Road.Then we walked along a footpath to what we thought was a hill but turned out to be a long barrow.We stood on the top from where we could see nearly all of our block.We then walked in the grass and nettles at the side of the main road to Tarrant Hinton.We passed lots of fields with crops or grass in them.We left Karl,Matthew and Paul there to do a traffic survey.Then we walked along the Tarrant valley towards the village of Tarrant Launceston which was just a few buildings and on to Monkton.We interviewed people and explored the villages to find out what we could.Some of the others went to a farm.Then we went back to school.
